title: FILTHY MINDS! Dirty Word Search Puzzle Book: 101 Word Find Puzzles – 1000+ Dirty Words and Slangs from Mildly Inappropriate to the Crude and Raunchy. Funny Gift for Adults
description: 101 Word Find Puzzles, with over 1000+ dirty and vulgar slang words ranging from mild cuss word alternatives to the slightly inappropriate to the crude and raunchy! This is the perfect book for adults who want to let loose and have a good time! Featuring 101 hilariously filthy word search puzzles with solutions, this book contains over 1000 cuss words, slangs, insults, and sex terms. Plus, five bonus puzzles with popular foreign cuss words! This large 8.5 x 11 inch book is a great way to have a laugh while you relax and expand your vocabulary. Makes a perfect funny or gag gift for any occasion – get your copy today! Disclaimer : This word search book for ADULTS ONLY contains lots and lots of filthy, funny, lewd, and totally offensive words! Lots of puzzles = Loads of filthy fun! ENJOY!
author: Dirty Minds Publishing
